game.name: 水浒：八方枭雄
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Steam Turn Notifications, Includes level editor, Family Sharing, Steam Timeline
game.shortDescription: A turn based strategy game based on the story of Water Margin, where players operate multiple heroes from one of the eight major factions to battle against different units and enemy factions. Defeat opponents through various strategies such as terrain, hero skills, combinations, traps, etc.
